speaker: Clinician
text: So, when you mentioned the, uh, stomach issues with sertraline, have you had anything similar with the fluoxetine, or has it been, um, smoother this time around?

speaker: Patient
text: No, thankfully, it's been much better. I was really worried about that, but, uh, no problems so far.

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good to hear. And, um, in terms of your mood, have you noticed any changes since we last adjusted the dose?

speaker: Patient
text: Actually, I think it's been pretty stable. I mean, work's been hectic, but I haven't felt, uh, overwhelmed like before.

speaker: Clinician
text: Great. And just to confirm, you're still taking it every morning, right? No missed doses?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, every morning. I have a reminder set on my phone, so I don't forget.
